The Historic Cocoa Village Playhouse, Inc. provides affordable community theatre and promotes lifelong education in the performing arts for Brevard County residents and visitors.
The Historic Cocoa Village Playhouse is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization in Partnership with
The City of Cocoa
.
Our programming is made possible through funding by the Florida Division of Arts and Culture and coordination through the City of Cocoa. We are supported by the Brevard County Board of County Commissioners and the Space Coast Office of Tourism.
Regionfooter_contact
(321) 636-5050
300 Brevard Ave, Cocoa, FL 32922
© 2009–2025 Cocoa Village Playhouse. All Rights Reserved.
Credits
|
Report Issue

Contact Us
info@cocoavillageplayhouse.com
(321) 636-5050
10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. Tuesday – Friday and one hour before any ticketed event.
To speak to one of our ticketing staff, call
(321) 636-5050
or after business hours, leave a clear voice message with your name and telephone number and we will return your call.
300 Brevard Ave, Cocoa, FL

Performances and Events
Auditions for Arsenic and Old Lace
Aug 9 - Aug 10
A Delightfully Dark Comedy with a Killer Cast of Characters. Join us for this wickedly funny tale of murder, mayhem, and eccentric family ties.
Blast Off To The Future
Aug 16
August 16 | Saturday | 7PM
Vaya Space
2941 Oxbow Circle
Cocoa, FL 32926

Please join the Aladdin Society for the final fundraiser celebrating 100 years of the Historic Cocoa Village Playhouse. T...

Aug 22 - Aug 24

Friday, August 22 - 7:30 p.m.
Saturday, August 23 - 2 p.m.
Saturday, August 23 - 7:30 p.m.
Sunday, August 24 - 2 p.m.

Includes ...
Buy Tickets
School of Rock: The Musical
Sep 12 - Sep 28
Based on the hit film, School of Rock is a high-octane, heartfelt rock musical that follows Dewey Finn — a down-and-out musician who poses as a substitute teacher at a prestigious prep school. W...
Buy Tickets
Auditions for Stars of Tomorrow Youth Program
Sep 15 - Sep 17
Training Tomorrow’s Performers — and Leaders. The Stars of Tomorrow Youth Program is designed to develop young performers in both the performing arts and essential life management skills.
Auditions for Annie
Sep 28 - Sep 29
A Beloved Musical for the Whole Family – Be Part of the Holiday Magic Join us in bringing to life one of Broadway's most cherished musicals. Annie tells the story of a young orphan's journey fil...
Chief Cherry & His Red Beans & Rice: Jazz at the Aladdin
Oct 3 - Oct 4
A modern homage to the golden era of big band jazz—live at The Historic Cocoa Village Playhouse.
Buy Tickets

Friday, October 17 - 7:30 p.m.

Saturday, October 18 - 7:30 p.m.
Sunday, October 19 - 2 p.m.

Auditions for Gypsy
Oct 25 - Oct 26
One of Broadway’s Greatest Musicals — A Tale of Dreams, Drive, and Family Widely regarded as the greatest American musical, Gypsy is a rich and rewarding show filled with iconic roles, unforgett...
Arsenic and Old Lace
Oct 31 - Nov 2
This Halloween, join us for one of Broadway’s most beloved dark comedies—Arsenic and Old Lace. When theatre critic Mortimer Brewster returns home to announce his engagement, he discovers a shock...
Buy Tickets
Annie
Nov 21 - Dec 14
This holiday season, one of Broadway’s most cherished musicals comes home to Cocoa Village. Set during the Great Depression, Annie follows a spirited young orphan who refuses to give up hope. Wh...
Buy Tickets
Stars of Tomorrow Holiday Showcase
Dec 9 - Dec 10
One stage. Two magical nights. Endless holiday cheer. Join us for a heartwarming evening of festive entertainment featuring the talented young performers of our Stars of Tomorrow youth program.
Buy Tickets
Michael Law & Friends: Making Spirits Bright – A Decade of Joy
Dec 12
A Cocoa Village holiday tradition returns—celebrating 10 years of music, laughter, and cheer.
Buy Tickets
Galmont Ballet’s The Nutcracker
Dec 19 - Dec 21
Experience the magic of the season with Galmont Ballet's enchanting production of The Nutcracker. Under the visionary direction of founders Frank Galvez and Lucia Montero, this classic ballet ha...
Buy Tickets
It’s a Wonderful Life – Film Screening
Dec 22
Join us for a special one-night-only screening of Frank Capra’s beloved 1946 classic, It’s a Wonderful Life, starring James Stewart and Donna Reed. This heartwarming tale of hope, redemption, an...
Buy Tickets
Auditions for Godspell
Jan 17 - Jan 18
A Musical Celebration of Community, Spirit, and Joy. Godspell is a vibrant and deeply human musical that brings the teachings of Jesus to life through parables, playful storytelling, and a genre...
Art Martin & The Rock & Roll Revue
Jan 23
Get ready to groove to the timeless hits of the 1950's, 1960's and 1970's as Art Martin leads the Melbourne Municipal Band's "Rock & Roll Revue" in a high-energy performance that will transp...
Buy Tickets
Gypsy
Feb 6 - Feb 22
Hailed by critics as one of the greatest musicals of all time, Gypsy is a powerful portrait of ambition, sacrifice, and the complexities of family. At its heart is Rose — the ultimate stage moth...
Buy Tickets
Auditions for Rock of Ages
Mar 7 - Mar 8
Big Hair. Bigger Dreams. The Loudest Show of the Season. Rock of Ages is a fist-pumping, laugh-out-loud musical featuring the greatest rock anthems of the ‘80s from Journey, Bon Jovi, Pat Benata...
Godspell
Mar 20 - Mar 29
A joyful celebration of community, compassion, and the timeless teachings of love, Godspell brings the parables of Jesus to life through a vibrant blend of storytelling, song, and improvisation.
Buy Tickets
Martha Seymour's The Golden Steppers: ...And All That Jazz!
Apr 12
Join us for an afternoon of toe-tapping delight as The Golden Steppers, under the spirited direction of Martha Seymour, present their latest showcase: ...And All That Jazz! This senior tap dance...
Buy Tickets
Rock of Ages
May 1 - May 17
Get ready to turn up the volume and party like it’s 1987. Rock of Ages is a big, loud, fun-fueled musical packed with hair-raising anthems and power ballads from rock legends like Journey, Bon J...
Buy Tickets
Auditions for Green Day’s American Idiot
May 17 - May 18
Raw. Urgent. Unforgettable. A Rock Opera for a New Generation. American Idiot is an electrifying rock musical based on Green Day’s iconic 2004 album, telling the story of three friends navigatin...
Galmont Ballet’s Défilé Classique: A Celebration of Dance
May 22 - May 23
Galmont Ballet returns to The Historic Cocoa Village Playhouse with Défilé Classique: A Celebration of Dance—a dazzling showcase of grace, precision, and artistry. This inspiring performance hig...
Buy Tickets

May 29 - May 31
Join Pooh and friends for a honey-sweet adventure in the Hundred Acre Wood! Based on the beloved stories by A.A.
Buy Tickets

Jun 5 - Jun 7
Journey down the rabbit hole in this fast-paced, fantastical adventure! Join Alice as she tumbles into the curious world of Wonderland in this madcap adaptation of Lewis Carroll’s timeless tale....
Buy Tickets
Friday FUNday!
Jun 12
An afternoon of laughter, music, and fun—created by kids, for kids! The Historic Cocoa Village Playhouse proudly presents its annual summer live variety show, Friday FUNday!, starring our talent...
Buy Tickets

Jun 19 - Jun 21

Buy Tickets

Jul 17 - Jul 26
The groundbreaking rock opera that defined a generation takes center stage in this raw and electrifying theatrical experience. Based on Green Day’s Grammy Award-winning album, American Idiot tel...
